TopicTitle: A (long?) list of ideas for KSP.

Articles.Content:
Now before I start I just want to say that In don't hate this game or I am super fussy, these are ideas off the top of my head split into categories.

Gameplay:

  • Seeing stats in VAB/SPH like MecJeb.
  • Attaching small parts,like docking ports etc..., on a ship in orbit.
  • For above, you can use the hitchhiker storage container to sort the parts. And, you can scavenge bits off flying debris too!
  • A program to create and upload custom Tutorials and Scenarios with ease.
  • Proper exploration*(JayCheetah Cheers)

Parts:

  • More wheel sizes/styles
  • A really wild idea, a mechanical arm that can pick up things.
  • Space shuttles
  • To help with the above, weights to balance unbalanced ships.
  • A fuel hose module to transfer fuel to nearby but un-docked ships* (Kizzies' idea)
  • Adjustable Suspension *(Lone. K)

Sound and Graphics:

  • A downloadable soundtrack
  • I'm sure you can somehow but an ability to put custom music in the game.
  • Texture Packs
  • Stop lag on Kerbin when I launch!!!!

Kerbals

  • Kerbals can interact like following, telling them to go etc...
  • Ability to change Kerbals' clothes and upgrade to big pack or mag boots etc... * (Idea given by Overlord)
  • I've defiantly seen this somewhere but why not kit out our Kerbals with parachutes. And with the ability to choose/upgrade it above you could make a Kerbalship!
  • You could put an attachment node onto Kerbals. Craft attached directly to Kerbal's backpacks could then be built.* (Holo's idea!)
  • A tether line for Kerbals so they don't go flying off* (Again, Kizzies' idea)

I think I have a good set off ideas. But you are welcome to add more!

*: Idea came up with in the comments

P.S: Thanks to all off you who gave Ideas!
